name: Dueling Galagas
description:
A local co-op twist over the well-renowned game Galaga. Each player covers one half of the arena. As bullets cross the middle of the screen, they are converted into enemy ships to which the other player must shoot down or face defeat. Play against a friend and prove your dexterity in this space shooting showdown.

--CONTROLS--

  • Upper Player (WASD) : W/D for Movement, S to Shoot
  • Lower Player (Arrow Keys) : Left/Right for Movement, Up to Shoot

--DEVELOPER NOTES--

This game is purely a prototype and is by no means complete. I made this to test a mechanic that I felt would be a fun and engaging foundation for a game and I do think it has potential. Whether or not I'll continue or extend this project is currently undetermined.
